gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all IP address aggregates.
gold.ideal: A JSON array of aggregate objects with details such as id, prefix, and description.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new IP address aggregate.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the creation of the aggregate with its id and details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific aggregate by ID.
gold.ideal: A JSON object containing the details of the specified aggregate.

gold.user: Network engineer updating an existing IP address aggregate.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the update with the updated details of the aggregate.

gold.user: Admin user deleting an IP address aggregate.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the deletion of the aggregate.

gold.user: Network administrator listing all ASN ranges.
gold.ideal: A JSON array of ASN range objects with details such as id, range, and description.

gold.user: Network engineer checking available ASNs for a specific range.
gold.ideal: A JSON array of available ASNs for the specified range.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new VLAN.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the creation of the VLAN with its id and details.

gold.user: Admin user partially updating VLAN details.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the partial update with the updated fields.
A JSON array of VRF objects with details such as id, name, and description.
A JSON object confirming the bulk deletion of roles.
